tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE SignatureVerificationLogs (
  log_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  request_id INT REFERENCES SignatureVerificationRequest(request_id),
  location_id INT REFERENCES LocationData(location_id),
  verification_result BOOLEAN,
  verification_timestamp TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE signature_verification_requests
(
	request_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
	timestamp TIMESTAMP,
	latitude DECIMAL,
	longitude DECIMAL
);

CREATE TABLE user_signatures
(
	signature_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
	request_id INT,
	signature TEXT,
	FOREIGN KEY (request_id) REFERENCES signature_verification_requests(request_id)
);

CREATE TABLE location_history
(
	location_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
	request_id INT,
	timestamp TIMESTAMP,
	latitude DECIMAL,
	longitude DECIMAL,
	FOREIGN KEY (request_id) REFERENCES signature_verification_requests(request_id)
);

CREATE TABLE verification_logs
(
	log_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
	request_id INT,
	verification_status BOOLEAN,
	verification_time TIMESTAMP,
	FOREIGN KEY (request_id) REFERENCES signature_verification_requests(request_id)
);

CREATE TABLE user_sessions
(
	session_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
	user_id INT,
	request_id INT,
	start_time TIMESTAMP,
	end_time TIMESTAMP,
	FOREIGN KEY (request_id) REFERENCES signature_verification_requests(request_id)
);
